faq_string: In our store ignorance of the rules does not exempt you from responsibility. Buying at least one product in the store you automatically agree with all the rules of the store! Rules of the store ❗1.In case of inadequate/offensive behavior the seller has the right to refuse the service! ❗2.A replacement is provided only if the product is invalid. ❗3.Replacement is provided only if there is a video proof. ❗4.30 minutes warranty period. ❗5.The administration is not responsible for any unlawful actions performed by the buyer with the items purchased in the store. ❗6.These terms and conditions may change at any time. ❗7.Money cannot be withdrawn from your balance.
admin_sending_result: Message sent to {counter} out of {len} active users. Total users:{users_count}
admin_add_items_msg: Send .json file with new items or type "cancel" for cancel.
admin_delete_category_confirmation: Do you really want to delete the category {category_name}?
admin_delete_subcategory_confirmation: Do you really want to delete the subcategory {subcategory_name}?
admin_refund_confirmation_by_username: Do you really want to refund user @{telegram_username} for purchasing {quantity} {subcategory} in the amount of ${total_price}
admin_refund_confirmation_by_tgid: Do you really want to refund user with ID:{telegram_id} for purchasing {quantity} {subcategory} in the amount of ${total_price}
admin_new_users_msg: {users_count} new users in the last {timedelta} days:
admin_sales_statistics: 📊 Sales statistics for the last {timedelta} days. 💰 Total profit: ${total_profit} 🛍️ Items sold: {items_sold} 💼 Total buys: {buys_count}
admin_successfully_refunded_with_tgid: Successfully refunded ${total_price} to user with ID{telegram_id} for purchasing {quantity} {subcategory}
buy_confirmation: You choose:{subcategory_name} Price:${price} Description:{description} Quantity:{quantity} Total price:${total_price}
my_profile_msg: Your profile ID: {telegram_id} Your BTC balance: {btc_balance} Your USDT balance: {usdt_balance} Your LTC balance: {ltc_balance} Your balance in USD: {usd_balance}$
top_up_balance_msg: Deposit to the address the amount you want to top up the {bot_name} Important A unique BTC/LTC/USDT addresses is given for each deposit The top up takes place within 5 minutes after the transfer Your BTC address {btc_address} Your USDT TRC-20 address {trx_address} Your LTC address {ltc_address}
balance_refresh_timeout: Please wait and try again later
user_notification_refund: You have been refunded ${total_price} for the purchase of {quantity} pieces of {subcategory}
admin_notification_new_deposit_username: New deposit by user with username @{username} for ${deposit_amount_usd} with
admin_notification_new_deposit_id: New deposit by user with ID {telegram_id} for ${deposit_amount_usd} with
new_purchase_notification_with_tgid: A new purchase by user @{username} for the amount of ${total_price} for the purchase of a {quantity} pcs {subcategory_name}.
new_purchase_notification_with_username: A new purchase by user with ID:{telegram_id} for the amount of ${total_price} for the purchase of a {quantity} pcs {subcategory_name}.
